main_definition: Students are individuals who attend school, college, or university to gain knowledge, skills, and qualifications.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of learners in an educational institution
meanings_and_examples.example: The students at Lincoln High School actively participate in various extracurricular activities.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Persons who are pursuing higher education and studying at a college or university level
meanings_and_examples.example: She is currently enrolled as an engineering student at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT).

meanings_and_examples.definition: Young people who attend school, regardless of whether they have completed their basic educational requirements
meanings_and_examples.example: The local community center offers programs and activities for elementary and middle school students.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A subset of a larger group of individuals with similar interests or objectives
meanings_and_examples.example: The environmental club consists of dedicated students passionate about protecting the planet.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A collective term for people who are seeking to improve their skills and knowledge in a particular field through continuous learning
meanings_and_examples.example: Online courses provide an opportunity for adults, including working professionals, to become lifelong learners or students.
